economy.title: ğŸ’° Economy Commands
economy.description: Commands related to the economy system.

fields.name: ğŸ’µ **!balance**
fields.value:
Check your current balance.
Usage: `!bal [user]`.

fields.name: ğŸƒ **!blackjack**
fields.value:
Play a game of blackjack.
Usage: `!bj <amount/all>`.

fields.name: ğŸ’° **!beg**
fields.value:
Beg for money and items. Has a cooldown.
Usage: `!beg`.

fields.name: ğŸ”« **!crime**
fields.value:
Engage in criminal activities.
Usage: `!crime`.

fields.name: ğŸ—“ï¸ **!daily**
fields.value:
Claim your daily reward.
Usage: `!daily`.

fields.name: ğŸ’° **!deposit**
fields.value:
Deposit money into your bank.
Usage: `!dep <amount/all>`.

fields.name: ğŸ **!gift**
fields.value:
Gift other players items from your inventory.
Usage: `!gift @username item_name [amount]`.

fields.name: ğŸ‡ **!horserace**
fields.value:
Start a horse race event.
Usage: `!hr <amount/all>`.

fields.name: ğŸ¾ **!hunt**
fields.value:
Go hunting for animals. Requires a rifle from the shop.
Usage: `!hunt`.

fields.name: ğŸ“¦ **!inventory**
fields.value:
View your current inventory.
Usage: `!inv [user]`.

fields.name: ğŸ† **!leaderboard**
fields.value:
View the leaderboard for top earners.
Usage: `!leaderboard`.

fields.name: ğŸ’¸ **!pay**
fields.value:
Pay another user a specified amount of cash.
Usage: `!pay @username <amount>`.

fields.name: ğŸ° **!slots**
fields.value:
Play a slot machine game.
Usage: `!slots <amount/all>`.

fields.name: ğŸ’¸ **!withdraw**
fields.value:
Withdraw money from your bank.
Usage: `!with <amount/all>`.

fields.name: âš’ï¸ **!work**
fields.value:
Earn money by working. Has a cooldown.
Usage: `!work`.

fun.title: ğŸ˜‚ Fun Commands
fun.description: Commands for entertainment and fun interactions.

fields.name: ğŸ“º **!bounce**
fields.value: Attach an image to make it bounce like the DVD screen.

fields.name: ğŸ³ï¸â€ğŸŒˆ **!gay**
fields.value:
Puts the gay flag over a targeted user.
Usage: `!gay <@mention>`.

fields.name: ğŸ˜‚ **!meme**
fields.value:
Get a fun or dark meme.
Usage: `!meme`.

fields.name: ğŸ” **!enhance**
fields.value:
Attach an image to improve its quality.
Usage: `!enhance`. Rate limited to 5 per day globally.

fields.name: ğŸ–¼ï¸ **!enlarge**
fields.value:
Make the emoji a bigger picture or GIF.
Usage: `!enlarge <:emoji:>`.

fields.name: ğŸ”¥ **!roast**
fields.value:
Send a roast and let them fry.
Usage: `!roast`.

fields.name: ğŸ± **!8ball**
fields.value:
Get a mystical answer.
Usage: `!8ball <message>`.

fields.name: â¤ï¸ **!kiss !kill !hug !slap !pat !blush**
fields.value:
Use these actions on any user or yourself.
Usage: `!kiss @user`.

fields.name: ğŸŒ **!ip <IP>**
fields.value: Looks up the GEO location and more from the provided IP.

fields.name: ğŸ‘¥ **!profile**
fields.value:
View and customize your profile.
Configurable settings:
`!pnick <nickname>` to change your nickname.
`!pdesc <description>` to change your description.

fields.name: ğŸ… **!badges**
fields.value:
View the badges from your profile.
Usage: `!badges`.

fields.name: ğŸ‘¤ **!avatar**
fields.value:
Show the avatar of yourself or the given user.
Usage: `!avatar [@user]`.

setup.title: ğŸ”§ Setup Commands
setup.description: Commands that require admin or owner permissions.

fields.name: ğŸ› ï¸ **!serveradmin**
fields.value:
Manage server administrators.
Usage: `!sadmin` `add <@user>` `remove <@user>` `list`.

fields.name: ğŸ› ï¸ **!servermod**
fields.value:
Manage server moderators.
Usage: `!smod` `add <@user>` `remove <@user>` `list`

fields.name: ğŸ”§ **!logging**
fields.value:
Mention a channel to enable server logging.
Usage: `!logging` `disable` `<#channel>`.

fields.name: ğŸ”§ **!setprefix**
fields.value:
Change the bot prefix for your server.
Usage: `!setprefix <prefix>.`

fields.name: ğŸ”§ **!warn**
fields.value:
Warn a user.
Usage: `!warn <user> [reason]`.

fields.name: ğŸ—’ï¸ **!clearwarnings**
fields.value:
Remove all warnings from a given user.
Usage: `!clearwarnings <usermention/id>`.

fields.name: ğŸ—‘ï¸ **!removewarning**
fields.value:
Remove a specific warning from a user.
Usage: `!removewarning <usermention/id> <warningID>`.

fields.name: ğŸ”‡ **!mute**
fields.value:
Mute a user for a specified duration or indefinitely.
Usage: `!mute <usermention/id> [duration]`

fields.name: ğŸ”Š **!unmute**
fields.value:
Unmute a previously muted user.
Usage: `!unmute <usermention/id>`

fields.name: ğŸ”¨ **!kick**
fields.value:
Kick a user from the server.
Usage: `!kick <user> [reason]`.

fields.name: ğŸš« **!ban**
fields.value:
Ban a user from the server.
Usage: `!ban <user> [reason]`.

fields.name: ğŸ­ **!addrole**
fields.value: Add a role to a user. (Manage Roles permission required.)

fields.name: ğŸ”¨ **!removerole**
fields.value: Remove a specific role from all members. (Manage Roles permission required.)

servershop.title: ğŸ’° Economy Server Shop Commands
servershop.description: Commands for managing and interacting with custom shops in your guild.

fields.name: ğŸ”§ **!addshopadmin**
fields.value:
Add a user as an admin for your shop.
Usage: `!addshopadmin <roleID>`.

fields.name: ğŸ› ï¸ **!createshop**
fields.value:
Create a new shop in your guild.
Usage: `!createshop name/a description/price/emoji`.

fields.name: âŒ **!deleteshopadmin**
fields.value:
Remove a userâ€™s admin privileges for the shop.
Usage: `!delshopadmin <roleID>`.

fields.name: ğŸ“¦ **!serverinventory**
fields.value:
View the items in the serverâ€™s inventory.
Usage: `!sinv`.

fields.name: ğŸª **!servershop**
fields.value:
View and manage your serverâ€™s shop.
Usage: `!ss`.

fields.name: ğŸ—‘ï¸ **!servershopremove**
fields.value:
Remove an item from the serverâ€™s shop.
Usage: `!ssrem <item name>`.

fields.name: ğŸ‘¥ **!shopadmins**
fields.value:
List all admins for the shop.
(View the administrators of your shop).

fields.name: ğŸ›’ **!shop**
fields.value:
View and purchase items from the shop.
Usage: `!shop`.

fields.name: ğŸ›’ **!buy**
fields.value:
Buy an item from the shop.
Usage: `!buy <item name>`.

levels.title: ğŸ“ˆ Levels
levels.description: Manage and check user levels within your server.

fields.name: ğŸ–ï¸ **!rankrole**
fields.value:
Automatically assign roles to users who reach a certain level.
Usage: `!rankrole <level> <roleID>`

fields.name: âŒ **!delrankrole**
fields.value:
Remove the level reward role for the given level.
Usage: `!delrankrole <level>`

fields.name: ğŸ… **!rankroles**
fields.value:
See what rewards you will get for certain levels you reach.
Usage: `!rankroles`

fields.name: ğŸ“ˆ **!setxp**
fields.value:
Set a specific amount of XP for any user in your server.
Usage: `!setxp <@user> <xp>`

fields.name: ğŸ–ï¸ **!setrank**
fields.value:
Set a specific rank for a user.
Usage: `!setrank <@user> <level>`

fields.name: ğŸ“Š **!resetlevels**
fields.value:
Removes all XP from all users in your server.
Usage: `!resetlevels`

utility.title: âš™ï¸ Utility Commands
utility.description: Various utility commands for server management.

fields.name: ğŸ¤– **!botinfo**
fields.value: Shows available information about the bot.

fields.name: ğŸ“¨ **!messages**
fields.value: View the total number of messages sent by a user. Usage: `!messages <userID/mention>`.

fields.name: âš™ï¸ **!setup**
fields.value: Initialize or configure the bot settings for the server.

fields.name: â„¹ï¸ **!serverinfo**
fields.value:
Displays information about the current server.
Usage: `!serverinfo`

fields.name: ğŸ“Œ **!sticky**
fields.value:
Stick a message to the channel.
Usage: `!sticky <message>`

fields.name: ğŸ› ï¸ **!roles**
fields.value:
Display all roles available in the server.
Usage: `!roles`

fields.name: ğŸ—‘ï¸ **!removesticky**
fields.value:
Remove the sticky message from the channel.
Usage: `!removesticky`

fields.name: ğŸ“ **!ping**
fields.value:
Check the bot and API latency.
Usage: `!ping`

fields.name: ğŸ“Š **!poll**
fields.value:
Only server moderators and users with manage messages can run this command.
Usage: `!poll <question>/answer1/answer2`.

fields.name: ğŸ”— **!invite**
fields.value:
Shows a link to invite the bot.
Usage: `!invite`.
